participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and open-minded, Emily enjoys exploring new places and learning about different subjects.
participant_1.background: I tend to wear a lot of comfortable clothes, but I make sure they're still stylish. both of my parents are in the military. I'm happy to have a close family and met Jimmy Fallon the other day. i think i need botos soon. I'm healthy because I'm responsible with my diet and I get enough sleep.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Jordan loves meeting new people and sharing his experiences.
participant_2.background: I can't resist a good salad from Aldi when I'm on the go. i can tell right away if i am going to like someone. i love to go to the lake. i vacation along lake michigan every summer. i like reading a lot.

content.text: Hey, I'm just taking a walk around the block, what are you up to?
Hello, I'm doing some reading, I love to read a lot.
Oh that's cool, what are you reading about?
I'm reading about the history of the United States.
That's interesting, I've always been interested in history but never really took the time to learn about it.
It's never too late to learn, I'm sure you'd find it really interesting.
Yeah, I probably will. I have always loved going to the library, I'll have to check out some books on history.
That's a great idea, I love going to the library too, it's so peaceful and quiet.
Yeah, it's my favorite place to relax. Do you like to go to the lake?
I love to go to the lake, I have a vacation home on Lake Michigan and I spend my summers there.
That's awesome, I've always wanted to go to Lake Michigan, it looks beautiful.
It is, you should definitely go sometime.
I will, I'm sure it would be a lot of fun.
It is, I love spending time there.
